alert.note: Alert for Marshall (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 2:27PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Marshall County through 245 PM CDT... At 227 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Minonk, or 14 miles southwest of Streator, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Marshall County. This includes Interstate 39 between mile markers 29 and 40. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
